#id=1
#text=We were starting to run out of food so I made a list of all the food items we were out of this morning .
#id=2
#text=I put on my jacket and shoes , grabbed my keys and left the house .
#id=3
#text=I started my car and decided to drive to Fred Meyer 's , an excellent grocery store .
#id=4
#text=I arrived at Fred Meyer 's and walked through the cold wind and into the safety of the store .
#id=5
#text=There were n't a lot of shoppers around thanks to the weather .
#id=6
#text=I grabbed a hand basket and proceeded to the produce section first for apples , bananas and potatoes .
#id=7
#text=After that I went to the bread section and got english muffins and a loaf of wheat bread .
#id=8
#text=Next I proceeded to the frozen food section for a frozen pizza .
#id=9
#text=The basket was starting to get full and heavy but I only had two more items left : milk and cheese .
#text=I headed for the dairy section , acquired my last few items and proceeded to checkout .
#text=Despite the store being not very busy the traditional checkout lines were all full so I used the self-checkout .
#text=I got my receipt and my bagged items and headed home to cook lunch .
